text: Ara yakhana tomara striderake talaka diye da'o, atahpara tara nirdharita iddata samapta kare neya, takhana tomara niyama anuyayi taderake rekhe da'o athaba sahanubhutira sathe taderake mukta kare da'o. Ara tomara taderake jbalatana o barabari karara uddesye atake rekho na. Ara yara emana karabe, niscaya'i tara nijedera'i ksati karabe. Ara allahara nirdesake hasyakara bisaye parinata karo na. Allahara se anugrahera katha smarana kara, ya tomadera upara rayeche ebam ta'o smarana kara, ye kitaba o jnanera katha tomadera upara nayila kara hayeche yara dbara tomaderake upadesa dana kara haya. Allahake bhaya kara ebam jene rakha ye, allaha sarbabisaye'i jnanamaya.
